amendment.description: Add at the end the following new section: SEC.___.SUNSET. This Act and the amendments made by this Act shall terminate on the date that is seven years after the date of the enactment of this Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 114-88 to sunset the provisions of the bill after 7 years.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Mulvaney.
